mapper.sql: QUALIFICATION_NO, CREATED_USER, BUSINESS_NO, BUSINESS_VALID_DATE, UPDATED_DATE, STATUS, CHANNEL_NAME, CERTIFY_NO, VALID_IND, CREATED_DATE, BUSINESS_EXPIRE_DATE, LICENSE_NO, TEL, SEX, LICENSE_EXPIRE_DATE, EMAIL, EDUCATIOIN, FAX, UPDATED_USER, BIRTHDAY, CERTIFY_TYPE, CHANNEL_CODE, LICENSE_VALID_DATE, ADDERSS, MOBILE, POST_CODE, DUTY, CONTRACT_NO, TITLE, CHILD_DEPT_LOOK, QUALIFICATION_VALID_DATE, QUALIFICATION_EXPIRE_DATE

QUALIFICATION_NO as "qualificationNo", CREATED_USER as "createdUser", BUSINESS_NO as "businessNo", BUSINESS_VALID_DATE as "businessValidDate", UPDATED_DATE as "updatedDate", STATUS as "status", CHANNEL_NAME as "channelName", CERTIFY_NO as "certifyNo", VALID_IND as "validInd", CREATED_DATE as "createdDate", BUSINESS_EXPIRE_DATE as "businessExpireDate", LICENSE_NO as "licenseNo", TEL as "tel", SEX as "sex", LICENSE_EXPIRE_DATE as "licenseExpireDate", EMAIL as "email", EDUCATIOIN as "educatioin", FAX as "fax", UPDATED_USER as "updatedUser", BIRTHDAY as "birthday", CERTIFY_TYPE as "certifyType", CHANNEL_CODE as "channelCode", LICENSE_VALID_DATE as "licenseValidDate", ADDERSS as "adderss", MOBILE as "mobile", POST_CODE as "postCode", DUTY as "duty", CONTRACT_NO as "contractNo", TITLE as "title"
mapper.update:
update CHANNEL_AGENT_DETAIL
QUALIFICATION_NO = #{qualificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_VALID_DATE = #{businessValidDate,jdbcType=DATE},
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHANNEL_NAME = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERTIFY_NO = #{certifyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE},
BUSINESS_EXPIRE_DATE = #{businessExpireDate,jdbcType=DATE},
LICENSE_NO = #{licenseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
LICENSE_EXPIRE_DATE = #{licenseExpireDate,jdbcType=DATE},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDUCATIOIN = #{educatioin,jdbcType=CHAR},
FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
CERTIFY_TYPE = #{certifyType,jdbcType=CHAR},
LICENSE_VALID_DATE = #{licenseValidDate,jdbcType=DATE},
ADDERSS = #{adderss,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUTY = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=CHAR}
where CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHANNEL_AGENT_DETAIL set QUALIFICATION_NO = #{qualificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_VALID_DATE = #{businessValidDate,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHANNEL_NAME = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERTIFY_NO = #{certifyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE}, BUSINESS_EXPIRE_DATE = #{businessExpireDate,jdbcType=DATE}, LICENSE_NO = #{licenseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, LICENSE_EXPIRE_DATE = #{licenseExpireDate,jdbcType=DATE}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDUCATIOIN = #{educatioin,jdbcType=CHAR}, FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, CERTIFY_TYPE = #{certifyType,jdbcType=CHAR}, LICENSE_VALID_DATE = #{licenseValidDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ADDERSS = #{adderss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUTY = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=CHAR} where CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHANNEL_AGENT_DETAIL
QUALIFICATION_NO = #{qualificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_USER = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_VALID_DATE = to_date(#{businessValidDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'),
UPDATED_DATE = sysdate,
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHANNEL_NAME = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERTIFY_NO = #{certifyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VALID_IND = #{validInd,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=DATE},
BUSINESS_EXPIRE_DATE = to_date(#{businessExpireDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'),
LICENSE_NO = #{licenseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
LICENSE_EXPIRE_DATE = to_date(#{licenseExpireDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'),
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDUCATIOIN = #{educatioin,jdbcType=CHAR},
FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = to_date(#{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'),
CERTIFY_TYPE = #{certifyType,jdbcType=CHAR},
LICENSE_VALID_DATE = to_date(#{licenseValidDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'),
ADDERSS = #{adderss,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DUTY = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHILD_DEPT_LOOK = #{childDeptLook,jdbcType=CHAR}
where CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CHANNEL_AGENT_DETAIL set QUALIFICATION_NO = #{qualificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_NO = #{businessNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_VALID_DATE = to_date(#{businessValidDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'), BUSINESS_EXPIRE_DATE = to_date(#{businessExpireDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'), LICENSE_EXPIRE_DATE = to_date(#{licenseExpireDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'), LICENSE_VALID_DATE = to_date(#{licenseValidDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'), UPDATED_DATE = sysdate, CHANNEL_NAME = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERTIFY_NO = #{certifyNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENSE_NO = #{licenseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDUCATIOIN = #{educatioin,jdbcType=CHAR}, FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_USER = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTHDAY = to_date(#{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'), CERTIFY_TYPE = #{certifyType,jdbcType=CHAR}, ADDERSS = #{adderss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST_CODE = #{postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUTY = #{duty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=CHAR}, QUALIFICATION_VALID_DATE = to_date(#{qualificationValidDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'), QUALIFICATION_EXPIRE_DATE = to_date(#{qualificationExpireDate,jdbcType=DATE},'yyyy/mm/dd'), CHILD_DEPT_LOOK = #{childDeptLook,jdbcType=CHAR} where CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(1) from CHANNEL_AGENT_DETAIL cad left join CHANNEL_MAIN pb on pb.CHANNEL_CODE = cad.CHANNEL_CODE

select * from ( select a.*,rownum rn from ( select pb.DEPT_CODE,dept_simple_name, cad.CHANNEL_CODE,CHANNEL_NAME,cad.QUALIFICATION_NO, cg.CATEGORY_NAME CATEGORY, decode(pb.APPROVE_FLAG, '1', '已审核', '0', '未审核', '已审核') APPROVE_FLAG, sa.salesman_cname APPROVE_CODE, decode(CHANNEL_FLAG, '0', '代理机构', '1', '个人代理', '') CHANNEL_FLAG, MOBILE,cad.TEL,cad.LICENSE_NO,cad.BUSINESS_NO, decode(cad.SEX, '106001', '男', '106002', '女', '106003', '不清楚', '106009', '未知', '') SEX, et.EDUCATIOIN_NAME EDUCATIOIN,DUTY, tt.TITLE_NAME TITLE, ct.CERTIFY_TYPE_NAME CERTIFY_TYPE, cad.CERTIFY_NO,BANK_NAME,BANK_ACCOUNT, BANK_NODE, decode(pb.valid_ind, '0', '是', '否') STATUS, cad.UPDATED_DATE, pb.business_line,
( case when ( select case when max(clcr.expire_date) is not null and max(clcr.expire_date) < sysdate then '1' else '0' end from CHANNEL_CONFER clcr where clcr.CHANNEL_CODE = pb.channel_code and clcr.VALID_IND = '1' ) = '1' and cad.qualification_expire_date is not null and trunc(cad.qualification_expire_date) < trunc(sysdate) then '执业证和协议过期' when cad.qualification_expire_date is not null and trunc(cad.qualification_expire_date) < trunc(sysdate) then '执业证过期' when ( select case when max(clcr.expire_date) is not null and max(clcr.expire_date) < sysdate then '1' else '0' end from CHANNEL_CONFER clcr where clcr.CHANNEL_CODE = pb.channel_code and clcr.VALID_IND = '1' ) = '1' then '协议过期' when cad.qualification_expire_date is null or trunc(cad.qualification_expire_date) > trunc(sysdate) and ( select case when max(clcr.expire_date) is null or max(clcr.expire_date) > sysdate then '1' else '0' end from CHANNEL_CONFER clcr where clcr.CHANNEL_CODE = pb.channel_code and clcr.VALID_IND = '1' ) = '1' then '正在代理（执业证及协议均未过期）' else '---' end ) "newStatus"
from CHANNEL_MAIN pb left join CHANNEL_AGENT_DETAIL cad on pb.CHANNEL_CODE = cad.CHANNEL_CODE left join CATEGORY cg on pb.CATEGORY = cg.CATEGORY_CODE and cg.valid_ind = '1' left join DEPARTMENT dept on pb.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE left join CERTIFY_TYPE ct on cad.CERTIFY_TYPE = ct.CERTIFY_TYPE_CODE and ct.valid_ind = '1' left join EDUCATIOIN et on cad.EDUCATIOIN = et.EDUCATIOIN_CODE and et.valid_ind = '1' left join TITLE tt on cad.TITLE = tt.TITLE_CODE and tt.valid_ind = '1' left join SALESMAN sa on pb.APPROVE_CODE = sa.employ_code and sa.valid_ind = '1'
order by cad.UPDATED_DATE desc ) a where rownum <= #{endpoint} ) where rn >= #{startpoint}

select QUALIFICATION_NO,BUSINESS_NO, to_char(BUSINESS_VALID_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "BUSINESS_VALID_DATE", cad.STATUS,cad.CHANNEL_NAME,CERTIFY_NO, to_char(BUSINESS_EXPIRE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "BUSINESS_EXPIRE_DATE", cad.LICENSE_NO,cad.TEL,SEX, to_char(LICENSE_EXPIRE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "LICENSE_EXPIRE_DATE", EMAIL,EDUCATIOIN,cad.FAX, to_char(BIRTHDAY,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "BIRTHDAY", CERTIFY_TYPE,cad.CHANNEL_CODE, to_char(LICENSE_VALID_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "LICENSE_VALID_DATE", ADDERSS,MOBILE,cad.POST_CODE,DUTY, CONTRACT_NO,TITLE,CHILD_DEPT_LOOK, BANK_NODE,BANK_ACCOUNT,REMARK,CHANNEL_CATEGORY,MISTAKE_CONTENT,BANK_PROVINCE, BANK_RECEIVE,FINANCE_FLAG,CHANNEL_TYPE,pb.DEPT_CODE,OFFICE_ADDRESS,BANK_NAME, CONTACT,BUSINESS_LINE,CHANNEL_FEATURE,BANK_CITY,MISTAKE_FLAG, CHANNEL_FLAG,CHANNEL_RATE,pb.DEPT_CODE || '-' || dept_simple_name dept_simple_name, to_char(QUALIFICATION_VALID_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "QUALIFICATION_VALID_DATE", to_char(QUALIFICATION_EXPIRE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "QUALIFICATION_EXPIRE_DATE", crd.RECOMMENDER_NAME as "recommenderName", pb.TAXPAYER as "taxpayerName", pb.TAXPAYER_NO as "taxpayerIdNum", pb.TAXPAYER_QUALIFICATION as "taxpayerQualify", pb.TAX_INVOICE as "invoiceType", pb.TAX_RATE as "taxRate" from CHANNEL_AGENT_DETAIL cad left join CHANNEL_MAIN pb on cad.CHANNEL_CODE = pb.CHANNEL_CODE and pb.VALID_IND = 1 left join DEPARTMENT dept on pb.DEPT_CODE = dept.DEPT_CODE left join channel_recommender_detail crd on cad.channel_code = crd.channel_code where cad.CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode} and cad.VALID_IND = 1

when.test: endpoint!=null and endpoint != '' and startpoint != null and startpoint != ''

mapper.select: select count(1) from channel_license_valid clv where clv.dept_code = substr(#{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},0,2) and clv.vavlid_ind = '1'
